pages.text: 39|57|athava kahe ki yadi allaah mujhe supath dikhaata, to main darane vaalon mein se ho jaata.
39|58|athava kahe jab dekh le yaatana ko ki yadi mujhe (sansaar mein) phirakar jaane ka avasar ho jaaye, to main avashy sadaachaariyon mein se ho jaoonga.
39|59|haan, aaeen tumhaare paas meree nishaaniyaan, to tumane unhen jhuthala diya aur abhimaan kiya tatha tum the hee kaafiron mein se.
39|60|aur pralay ke din aap unhen dekhenge, jinhonne allaah par jhooth bole ki unake mukh kaale honge. to kya narak mein nahin hai abhimaaniyon ka sthaan
39|61|tatha bacha lega allaah jo aagyaakaaree rahe, unhen, unakee saphalata ke saath. nahin lagega unhen koee duhkh aur na ve udaaseen honge.
39|62|allaah hee pratyek vastu ka paida karane vaala tatha vahee pratyek vastu ka rakshak hai.
39|63|usee ke adhikaar mein hain aakaashon tatha dharatee kee kunjiyaan[1] tatha jinhonne nakaar diya allaah kee aayaton ko, vahee kshati mein hain.
39|64|aap kah den: to kya allaah se any kee tum mujhe ibaadat (vandana) karane ka aadesh dete ho, he agyaano

39|65|tatha vahî€¼yee kee gaee hai aapakee or tatha un (nabiyon) kee or, jo aapase poorv (hue) ki yadi aapane shirk kiya, to avashy vyarth ho jaayega aapaka karm tatha aap ho jaayenge[1] kshatigraston mein se.
39|66|balki aap allaah hee kee ibaadat (vandana) karen tatha krgyayon mein rahen.

39|67|tatha unhonne allaah ka sammaan nahin kiya, jaise usaka sammaan karana chaahiye tha aur dharatee pooree usakee ek mutthee mein hogee, pralay ke din tatha aakaash lapete hue honge usake haath[1] mein. vah pavitr tatha uchch hai us shirk se, jo ve kar rahe hain.
